title: Horaires Me ! (Paris)
description: Simple but effective this application allows you to view schedules of Paris public transportation.- RER- Transilien- Bus- Paris Metro.- Tram- Noctilien- Location of bus and metro stopsAlso contains the network plans and a traffic bulletinNote: To access the geolocation, a minimum OpenGL version is required, as well as Google Play Services.If you encounter any problems or if you have any suggestions please do not hesitate to contact me by email!
descriptionHTML:
Simple but effective this application allows you to view schedules of Paris public transportation.
- RER
- Transilien
- Bus
- Paris Metro.
- Tram
- Noctilien
- Location of bus and metro stops

Also contains the network plans and a traffic bulletin

Note: To access the geolocation, a minimum OpenGL version is required, as well as Google Play Services.

If you encounter any problems or if you have any suggestions please do not hesitate to contact me by email!
comments: Great application, backup function is great. Much better than the ratp app
Plus aucun horaire depuis la derni√®re maj ...
After installing update my phone started rebooting non stop. I had to reinstall my phone.
excellent and better than RATP EXCELLENT app and way much better than the annoying RATP app... thank you for this amazing app!!!!
